Definitions of reproducibilty





Repeatable
Reproducible (same data, same analysis)
GitHub Repo or OSF project


Re-runnable
Robust & Replicable (same code, different data/analysis/parameters)
Documentation, functions


Portable
Not considered (same code/data, different environment)
requirements.txt, Dockerfile


Extendable
(partly) Generalisable



Modifiable
(partly) Generalisable
